item.title: Multifactorial experiment simulator
item.description: Instructions This tool allows user to simulate multifactorial experiments. The optimization result can be verified here: This tool provides an error of the estimated values for the factors.  Select number of factors Next  Select the upper and lower limits Factor Lower limit Upper limit  Perform individual experiment/measure distance from optimum value (validate optimum value) Factor Value  Perform bulk experiments To perform bulk experiments, paste your excel data here.
